Zoo Database Management System 
 
 This is a group project (3 members). 
 
 In this project, we are designing a database system for zoo management. For this, first we have done research about the domain itself and collected data requirements (such as information about the main components of the system, how the system works, how different entities interact with each other etc.) 
 
 We are designing the system as practical as possible. Assumptions made comply well with real-world situations/scenarios.
